title: Skid & Pump
desc: Two VERY spooky kids, celebrating all day, everyday! By being (non-blood related) cousins of Girlfriend's, they were allowed entry to Dearest's old halloween castle. Pump is actually a ghost who, conveniently, died dressed as one. His soul wasn't ready to die, no one knows about this, only Skid's mother knows, Lila.

cData.desc: Spooky Kids Revamp Sketch by EllisBros
Original Spooky Kids Design by DastardlyDeacon
Original Week 2 Concept by DastardlyDeacon (Based off Transylvania Mania
